entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
